Types

tAccordion

TYPE tAccordion RECORD <anonymous wc_accordion R3>
    
title STRING
narrative STRING
sections DYNAMIC ARRAY OF tSection
END RECORD

END RECORD

Serialize

FUNCTION Serialize(r_accordion tAccordion) RETURNS STRING

Serialize an accordion structure

   p_json string
 let p_json = wc_jqaccordion.Serialize(r_acc.*)
